entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
